title: Requires nursing homes to provide potential residents with policy on granting physician privileges prior to executing agreement
summary: Requires nursing homes to provide potential residents with policy on granting physician privileges prior to executing agreement.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          230

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. CAHILL -- read once and referred to the Committee
         on Health

       AN  ACT  to  amend the public health law, in relation to prior notice of
         physician privileges in nursing home residency agreements

         THE PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND  ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 3 of section 2803-c of the public health law is
    2  amended by adding a new paragraph q to read as follows:
    3    Q.  A  STATEMENT  INDICATING  THE POLICY OF THE FACILITY REGARDING THE
    4  GRANTING OF PHYSICIAN PRIVILEGES TO RESIDENTS.
    5    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.







        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01045-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to prior notice of physician privileges in nursing home residency agreements
